timeline.message:
BEAM-11193: Fix KeyedTimerData

outputTimestamp is a new field added to KeyedTimerData recently, which should be encoded/decoded at last.

timeline.bodyText: Ideally, this field should be put immediately after "timestamp" field so that when perform a range query, the earliest entries will be processed first.  The assumption for this fix is that the outputTimestamp will not contribute to the order of range query.
timeline.author: dengpanyin

timeline.bodyText: Maybe add a comment saying this condition is used for version upgrade, can be cleaned up later.
timeline.author: dengpanyin
